ygData.msgSnippet: ... The CR chamber opens, and Hot Rod steps out. He is fully repaired. Well... I m alive. Hot Rod walks down the hall, and sees Kluster. Hey Kluster.

: :Hot Rod: :

The CR chamber opens, and Hot Rod steps out.
He is fully repaired.
"Well... I'm alive."
Hot Rod walks down the hall, and sees Kluster.
"Hey Kluster."
